meanings.definition: A computer system with two or more central processing units.
meanings.sent1: My friend's new computer has multiprocessors for faster performance.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in multiprocessors to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The multiprocessors in the computer chatted with each other while processing data.
meanings.sent4: The multiprocessors in the server worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: I was amazed by the speed of the multiprocessors as they handled multiple tasks at once.

meanings.definition: A system in which multiple processors work together to perform tasks simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The multiprocessors in the supercomputer collaborated seamlessly to solve complex problems.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying how multiprocessors can enhance data processing capabilities.
meanings.sent3: The multiprocessors decided to throw a party while running calculations.
meanings.sent4: The multiprocessors danced in sync, completing tasks with precision and speed.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the multiprocessors in action was like watching a synchronized performance.
